results.content: This is a great course.  I liked it so much I did the whole course in about a week.  As more of a SQL Developer/BI (database mainly in SQL Server and python programming), I was never too good at JS.  I like that AlpineJS was more to the point and wanted to learn it so I could get more into Full Stack web dev.  This course gave me all the tools I need to get started and continue my learning on my own.  The instructor is amazing and I encourage everyone who is interested in AlpineJS and Tailwindcss to take it.  100 percent recommend it to new and experienced coders alike.

results.content: Good overview and exactly what I needed. I'm not sure if it would be easy for a beginner, but if you understand a bit of JavaScript and CSS, you will be fine

results.content: I'm a video tuition fanatic and spent way too much on courses but this is a superb course – I love Martin's slow but thorough manner – he really goes into detail leaving no frustrating foggy areas – I bought his Tailwind one soon after, LOVE IT! thanks Martin

results.content: Martin is a great teacher I highly recommend this course

results.content: after finishing 2/3 of the course I am still very eager to learn more. Interesting subject, good learning curve, well thought examples and challenges, likeable teacher! I would recommend this course to everyone interested to get an introduction to Alpine.js

response.content: Thank you very much Dagmar! I even continue after this course with more Alpinejs topics. Just follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/KrebsEberth
